home_title: Theunis Duminy & Mignon Du Plessis are getting married!
rsvp_sub: Let us know if you'll be able to attend the weekend.
naweek_plan_sub: Where, when and what someones wheres to this shindig.
geskenk_idees_sub: Stuff Mignon says we desperately need, apparently.
waar_die_troue_is_2: if you haven't figured it out already.
naweek_bywoon: Let us know if you can attend the weekend
home_sub: Navigate back to the home page of the site
number_error: Please check if your number is correct
rsvp_error: Please indicate if you can come and your dietary requirements

vrydag.copy: It's a long weekend - take leave! Everyone can check in at their accommodation from 15:00 onwards and enjoy a delightful spit braai in the evening. Although we're in the Karoo, we'll still be enjoying Heidelberg lamb.

saterdag.copy: The big day. Breakfast starts at 08:00 at the hotel. Keep yourself busy with all the activities in Matjiesfontein, but make sure to be dressed and ready for the ceremony that will start, strictly, at 15:00.

sondag.copy: Take a dip in the pool to wash off that hangover. Breakfast starts again at 08:00. Have a safe journey back, and thank you for attending our special weekend.
